QuestData.Title: The Heart of the Matter
QuestData.Description: From what Nahuud has told me, two mighty creatures, Rokmar the Crackler and Quagmirran, were among the first enslaved by the naga when they arrived. They helped to subjugate many of the native races of Zangarmarsh.$B$BThough it pains me greatly to ask you to do so, you must put them down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring The Invader's Claw and The Slave Master's Eye to Watcher Jhang.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad that their spirits are now free. I wish we could say the same for the rest of their kind.$B$BThere is still much work to be done, especially elsewhere in Coilfang.
